snippet: Fans of polish colors that call to mind egg yolk and edamame may be happy to know that a raft of new yellow and green shades are arriving on stores shelves just in time for spring and summer.
abstract: Fans of polish colors that call to mind egg yolk and edamame may be happy to know that a raft of new yellow and green shades are arriving on stores shelves just in time for spring and summer.

headline.main: Yellow and Green Nail Shades for Spring
